title: The Cemetery of the elephants
creator_credit: Armando Robles Godoy, Mario Vasquez, Films Incorporated and Producciones Cinematograficas Nacionales
brief_description: An allegorical story about a young writer who leaves home with his manuscript determined to conquer the world, then returns home after years of struggle as an old man with the world still unconquered. Non-narrated. Suitable for middle secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Armando Robles Godoy, Mario Vasquez, Films Incorporated and Producciones Cinematograficas Nacionales
